storyInfo: Laios, having become well-acquainted with the ink spirits in the mountains, has found a way to make fruit juice, jam, and wine with their help. In doing so, he's also begun to uncover the hidden truths of the painting.

attributes.content: ...So I followed Falin into the cave.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Which is where I found out her 'secret.'
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: She also explained what 'ecology' was while we were there. It was the first time I realized how limited my experiences had been.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: That's the day she and I became best friends.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: What more can one ask for in life but a companion dear?
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: From the way you talk about her, this Falin must be very important to you.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: You're right. She's the closest friend I have.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Shouldn't you be looking for her, then?
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: I remember you telling me that she was eaten by a red dragon, but you have some means of reviving her.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: Red dragon... Red...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: We will save her. And once we do, I'll bring her back to P'o-shan to meet you!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Very well.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: There goes the bell again. That's rather frequent for one day.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: It better not be Laios's fault!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: I'll go have a look!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: *sigh* This... is about all I can do.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: It seems it's up to you to save your companions, Laios.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: What's the matter, Marcille?
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: It's strange. The bell went off, but the ink spirits didn't attack.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Laios hasn't returned either.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Haha, if you like apricots, then go get 'em!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Hup!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: He throws a handful of apricots he picked into the distance and a pack of bestial ink spirits, large and small, chase after them.
Laios rejoices in watching them squabble over the fruit. Almost wanting to take the entire pack home to raise as dogs.
Right, they're just like Nussa, Anowtrid, Boff, Fucci, Dustrag, and Muimui!
Hraaagh—
attributes.name: Gormless Ink Spirit

attributes.content: No need to rush, plenty more to go around!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: For the ink spirits that resemble sloths, Laios feels no need to make them fight over the fruits.
He's become familiar with the habits of this species of ink spirits, setting aside a pile of apricots just for them to eat as they please.
Once they eat their fill, they lie down, and the color of their backs begins to change...
As he watches them try to stuff their mouths despite their protruding, plump bellies, he wonders how anyone couldn't be fond of these little fellows.
Aaaaaagh—
attributes.name: Relaxed Ink Spirit

attributes.content: No need to worry. Did you think I forgot about you guys?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: The tortoise-like ink spirits might be the species Laios is most interested in. At first, he thought they were giant rocks, at least until his butt made contact with its shell.
Their temperament is exactly the same as a tortoise. The most interesting thing about them is that once their appetites are sated, spring water begins to flow out the false mountains on their backs!
Thunder rumbles in the distance.
Upon hearing it, the ink spirits begin to stand, one by one.
Though they discover that they cannot, for one simple reason...
They've stuffed themselves silly!
Aye, looks like it's gonna be a good harvest this year.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: And it's all thanks to you, Senshi.
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: If you weren't here, my harvest would only be about half as much!
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: All I'm doing is putting my knowledge to good use.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Senshi, stop with the farming!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: What's wrong, Marcille?
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: It's been days since Laios went off to look for ink spirits outside the village, and he hasn't returned!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Laios? Well, the lad's fond of research. Let him be.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: The ink spirits haven't been attacking the village lately either...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Surely something's happened to him?!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Oh... Well, we were planning on staying here for long anyhow. No harm in waiting a bit longer.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: No, no... We can't stay here long!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: We need to go beat the Red Dragon and save Falin! Have you forgotten all that?!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Now that you mention it, Marcille, how long have we been in this village?
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Hrgh—!
attributes.name: Ink Spirits

attributes.content: Hungry again?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: My oh my, you're greedy little fellows, aren't you?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: No need to worry, plenty for everyone today too.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Though we're going to do something a bit different this time around.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Gkh—gkh?
attributes.name: Gormless Ink Spirit

attributes.content: Hugkh?
attributes.name: Lively Ink Spirit

attributes.content: Hah—hoo...
attributes.name: Relaxed Ink Spirit

attributes.content: See the peak of that hill over there?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: I put lots of your favorite fruit there.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: If you want to eat, you'll have to fight for it! It's one of the laws of nature!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: GKH—GKH!
attributes.name: Ink Spirits

attributes.content: Well, if everyone understands the rules, I'll start counting. Three, two, one...
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Go! Get running!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: The ink spirits start charging towards the hilltop on his command. All save for the tortoise-shaped ones, that is.
Aaaaaagh—
attributes.name: Relaxed Ink Spirit

attributes.content: Oh, you'd like me to sit? You really want me to ride you?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Haha, you're a smart one. You figured out that instead of fighting the others, you can just butter me up.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Hoo—ahh...
attributes.name: Relaxed Ink Spirit

attributes.content: Alright, alright. Here, have a bite.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Amidst the mounts, days pass like the wind.
By now, Laios has figured out it's the thunder that triggers the ink spirits to attack the village.
But external stimulus like that won't change their inherent habits. Laios knows this too well.
So why not lure them as far away from the village as possible with fruits?
That way, if they attack again, they'll have to run all the way from the top of the hill rather than halfway down!
Ahh... *hic*... This is some really good stuff...
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: What do you say, enough?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: No... No way!
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: Another cup, then.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Chilchuck!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Eh? What are you doin' here, Marcille?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Stop drinking already!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Laios has been gone for who knows how long!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: The ink spirits haven't been attacking lately either.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: He must have done something!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Then let him do his thing, I'm drinking here.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Figures he'd be like us from just a bit earlier.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Right. He's practically a villager at this point.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Chilchuck, do you remember how long it's been since we arrived here?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Do you remember how we need to rescue Falin?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Do you remember those mimics you really really hated?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: ...Ghh, gah, my head.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Is your memory coming back?!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Chilchuck, are you alright?
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Gkh gkh gkh, gkh? (So, what're your names?)
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Gkh gkh!
attributes.name: Gormless Ink Spirit

attributes.content: Wuh!
attributes.name: Lively Ink Spirit

attributes.content: Aaaaaagh—
attributes.name: Relaxed Ink Spirit

attributes.content: Gkh gkh gkh wuh! Laios! (I see now, your names are 'Bitey', 'Angry' and 'Lazy'? I'm Laios!)
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Wuu gkh, gkh gkh!
attributes.name: 'Bitey'

attributes.content: Gkh gkh gkhhh!
attributes.name: 'Angry'

attributes.content: Hoo—
attributes.name: 'Lazy'

attributes.content: Gkh gkh huu gkh wuu gkh gkh! (Of course we're friends!)
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Secluded in the mounts, Laios loses track of time.
He no longer cares if the thunder booms or not.
He's now good friends with the ink spirits. They eat together and live together. Every day, they pluck fresh fruits and frolic about in the hillside forest.
He even understands their speech—
You sure the lad's around here?
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: No... But the ink spirits all came from this direction.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: If he's been researching them this whole time, I figured he'd be here.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: You said that ever since he came out here, the ink spirits haven't been attacking the village as much.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Maybe he did something to stop them?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: But I've got a sneaking suspicion he's run off to play with them god-knows-where...
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: You might be right... We'd better find him, quick!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: The longer Laios lives with them, the more he has come to understand these 'ink monsters.'
I should head back and tell everyone about this.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: They'll be amazed! After all—
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Gkh gkh?
attributes.name: 'Bitey'

attributes.content: Gkh gkh woo! (Come with me. I'll introduce you guys to my companions.)
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Wuu gkh—
attributes.name: 'Angry'

attributes.content: Wuu wuu gkh gkh! (Don't worry, they're good people. They won't harm you—)
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Wuu—
attributes.name: 'Lazy'

attributes.content: Gkh—gkh— (Yeah, I'm sure they'll welcome you all!)
attributes.name: Laios
Marcille
attributes.content: Laios, we're here to help—

attributes.name: Marcille
attributes.content: you...

attributes.name: Marcille
attributes.content: Huh?
The three rescuers see a most bizarre scene.
Laios, the one they’ve been worried about and eagerly searching for...
is crawling around on all fours like a wild animal, talking to the ink spirits in an incomprehensible language.
It was at that moment that they felt something shatter in their hearts.
Wuu gkh gkh! (Oh, you guys came at just the right time!)
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Wha...?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Oh, sorry. I've been using their language for so long, I nearly forgot how to speak to humans.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: ...Sorry to have bothered you. We'll be on our way.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Hey, don't go, I've got some real important discoveries to tell you!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Oh, no, no need. We'll find our own way out and let you live out your dream here.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: I was gonna say I learned something about how to leave.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: ...You learned what now?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Just watch.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Hey guys, it's lunch time!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Gkh—! (Happily scramble to each and every pile of fruit)
attributes.name: Ink Spirits

attributes.content: Did... Did you tame them with all this fruit?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Hraaagh—
attributes.name: 'Bitey'

attributes.content: They're changing color!
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: That's one of its traits. Bitey changes color when it's full.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: It's called Bitey?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Mhm. The one that looks like a small dog is Angry, and the tortoise-shaped one is Lazy.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Did you name them?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: No, they told me.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Gkh, gkh—blurgh—
attributes.name: 'Bitey'

attributes.content: Eurgh, this one's eaten so much it puked! And the vomit's so colorful, it's kinda sickening—
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Hmm? Wait, that smell... Is that... alcohol...?
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: What are you doing, Senshi?! That's ink spirit puke!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Smells like fruit wine. Hmm... A good ferment, if my nose is right.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Tastes pretty good, too.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Don't just eat random things!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Calm down, Marcille. Listen.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Listen for what?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: The sound of what's sloshing around in their bellies. This one has wine inside, while this one has jam.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: ...And?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Keep looking.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Aye, this one's got gushing springs on its back after eating all that fruit. Hmm... This... Oh my, how refreshing. It's fruit juice!
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: What does any of this have to do with getting out of here?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Wait a moment and you'll see.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Senshi, do you have any containers we can keep the jam and drinks in?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: I do. I've been drinking with the villagers a whole lot recently, so I got a few cups and bottles on me.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Don't tell me you're thinking of...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Don't tell me you want to...!!!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Nicely done, though this jam will need some sugar if you want it to be palatable.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: As for the juice... It's refreshing, sure, but a bit bland.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: But if we blend the juices that go well together...
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Add in some sugar, stir it until it's mixed evenly...
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Pour into a glass, add fruit slices for decoration, and... It's done!
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: My improved ink spirit wine, jam, and juice! Give it a try!
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Oh, this fruit wine really does have new flavors to it.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Bit too much sugar for one day, though. We should get some exercise to work it off.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: I really don't want to speak with people who are willing to eat vomit...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Honey is bee vomit, Marcille.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: The vegetables I grow on the golems are also fertilized with excrement from people in the dungeon—
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Stop! I don't wanna hear it!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: What's up, Laios? You haven't said a word since earlier.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: I'll tell you all my plans now.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: When I was chasing that ink spirit with the mole, I was surprised to discover that they'd happily slack off from attacking the village if it meant they got to eat fruit instead.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Which means...?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Monsters do attack humans, and sometimes that is due to their aggressive nature...
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: But most of the time there's a specific reason, like their habitat getting encroached upon, or something happened that enraged them.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: But there's no reason why they attacked the village. At first I thought it was out of hunger, but these guys are far too docile and meek when they eat to back it up.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Gkh?
attributes.name: 'Angry'

attributes.content: Yeah... That one's even dripping with spit.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Then there's the villagers. It's incredibly strange how they have absolutely no understanding of ink spirit behavior.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: We've only just arrived and I've already found out you can tame them with fruit. But the villagers have clashed with them countless times. They should've learned a thing or two about handling them, even if they didn't want to.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: But they haven't. It's like they have no need for it.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Maybe they tried before, but didn't learn the proper way?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: That'd be even stranger. If they tried and failed, wouldn't it make more sense to just leave this dangerous place? Obviously, they chose to stay, so wouldn't they want to keep trying to fend them off?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: They won't leave and they won't find a way to fend them off. So how are they still living here?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: And haven't you guys ever wondered why we couldn't find an ink spirit 'nest'?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: What's more, they can come back to life endlessly. It's as if... this whole place is fake.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Oh? What an interesting theory.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: Dawn? When did you...?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Please, do go on.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: Where we come from, legend speaks of a 'lunatic magician,' who used his tremendous magical power to create a dungeon.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: All sorts of monsters live within it.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: But their existence isn't isolated, but interconnected. They prey on, exploit, and sometimes form symbiosis with one another...
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: They're all part of one ecosystem.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: No matter what kind of man this lunatic magician is, I can tell just how amazing of a feat that was. As for this place...
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Someone who could create such a vivid, life-like world must be amazing as well.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: (Drooling and smacking its lips)
attributes.name: 'Bitey'

attributes.content: I wonder... why didn't this person design a more complete ecosystem when creating the ink spirits?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Where do they build their nests? How do they reproduce? How do different variations communicate with one another? And what's their relationship to the people who live here?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: I'm so curious about all this, but I don't see how all the pieces fit together. Why did that person make things this way?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: And there's one more thing I noticed.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: They hid away a basket of hawthorn berries, but never once ate from it.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: ...Hawthorn?
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: (Whispers) Hawthorn, is it...
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: (Whispers) I never noticed.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: Sorry, what was that?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Nothing, just thinking aloud is all.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: But... I see now.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: The connection between all things, which you deem important, serves as a mutual affirmation of one another. I am your mirror, and you mine. This is the 'truth' as you understand it.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: Marcille, how come I don't understand a word of what those two are saying?
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Uh... Umm... I'd love to agree with you, but I think I can understand them a liiiittle bit...
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: *burst of laughter* Interesting, very interesting.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: You are right. All things adhere to logic. As with all the other myriad forms of life within a painting, so too must ink spirits have a place to come from, and a place to go.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: I suppose rootless weeds such as them would be flaws in reality.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: There have been a few who were able to discern that they were in no more than a painting, but... It's been quite a while since someone explained their reasoning with such conviction.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: Perhaps this can be seen as another way of saying 'the mountains are but mountains, and the water is yet water.'?
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: After saying that, for some unknown reason, she turns and looks up at the sky.
He has seen the truth beyond the veil of wonder, no?
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: Huh?
What's happened to this painting?!
I painted a perfectly good landscape on this! Why is it all like this now?
The ugly ink blots, the water stain, and the blotches of red and purple... Did someone sneak into my room?
Could it have been...
No, this time it isn't the work of my 'lovely sister'...
How interesting. Perhaps there is an unruly spirit roaming the wilds with a penchant for artistry.
Whoa! I think the whole mountain shook with that thunder.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Oh dear. It seems you've made her truly angry.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: What? Who? Who's angry?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: And no wonder, what with all the ink spirits you lured over, and how you got them so drunk they can barely even stand. This is the first time I've seen them like this.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: Dawn, what are you talking about?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Look! Up there! Someone's... falling out of the sky?!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Uhh... more like flying... and she looks pissed! Maybe she's the magician who created this place?!
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: Awawawah! Laios must have made her mad with his blabbering!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: What?! But I didn't say anything wrong!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: No need to panic. She's not here to harm you, just... consider it a unique way to send you on your way.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: The ink spirits are simply her distracting thoughts, and as such, I hope you understand why she didn't feel the need to organize them properly.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: Hey! Be gentle with them! They've just eaten, you can't lift them upside-down like that!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Gkh—blurghh—
attributes.name: 'Bitey'

attributes.content: Quick, take this bottle and fill it up with that jam! Don't let it go to waste!
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Get—out—NOW!
Wha-wha-what?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: How are you drawing with that sw—
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: —orrrrrrrrdAHHHH—
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: —Ow! My butt!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Eeeek!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: How did we... Are you guys alright?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: *cough* *cough* *cough*...I'm here. Still alive.
attributes.name: Chilchuck

attributes.content: I'm alright too.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Hmm... I can smell the sea.
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: Are we close to the coast?
attributes.name: Senshi

attributes.content: I don't know, but at the very least, we've gotten out of that place. Probably.
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: No, wait, I didn't even have time to say goodbye to them!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: I guess things really did work out thanks to Laios's love of monsters.
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Wait, Marcille, your mouth...
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Why's it all black?
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: You couldn't stop yourself from trying some earlier, could you?!
attributes.name: Laios

attributes.content: Mmwuh? ...Wait, it's the same with you guys!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: Puh! Pfah! Pfeh! Pfoo! What is this taste?
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: What did we just eat?!
attributes.name: Marcille

attributes.content: ...Looks like this painting's got to go.
attributes.name: Dusk

attributes.content: I thought they were an amusing bunch. Not going to try some? There are some hawthorn berries here too.
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: Not even a bite?
attributes.name: Dawn

attributes.content: Absolutely not!
attributes.name: Dusk
